content: a fresh modern take on a floral motif rosie is a quick and simple patternthat can be used with different yarns for different effects a nice way to use up odds and ends of yarn sizes s m l 1 5 1 75 2 / 3 5 4 5 5cm diameter materials yarn peace fleece worsted or other worsted weight yarn about 4 yds/ 3 5 metres color of your choice sample shown is peace fleece georgia rose crochet hook size g/4mm notions removable stitch marker tapestry needle skills crochet in the round half-double_crochet this pattern is available in us/canadian terminology and aus/nz/uk terminology
